title: Creative Lead (UX/UI)
overview: Creative Lead (UX/UI) at Superside. Lead and guide a team of UX/UI designers working on strategic projects for global brands. Excellent growth opportunities.
description: As the UX/UI Creative Lead at Superside, you will have the opportunity to lead and guide our team of UX/UI designers. We work on significant strategic projects for global brands like Meta, Google, Amazon, or Twitch, creating stunning mobile & web apps, landing pages, dashboards, and other digital products. You will work with a globally distributed team of top-talent creatives with plenty of professional growth opportunities. Key responsibilities include leading and mentoring a team of designers, setting the creative vision and standards, managing the design process, and working cross-functionally with other teams. You should have excellent English verbal and written communication skills, a problem-solving mindset, knowledge of front-end languages, and experience in complex design system development. A strong portfolio showcasing your UX/UI design skills and 7+ years of experience as a UX/UI Designer, with 2+ years in a leadership role, are required.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design, or similar education
7+ years of experience as a UX/UI Designer, with 2+ years in a leadership role
Strong portfolio showcasing your UX/UI design skills
Expertise in design software such as Figma, and Adobe Creative Suite
Excellent visual design skills with a focus on user-system interaction
Proven experience leading and managing a team of designers
Strong communication, presentation, and leadership skills
Excellent problem-solving abilities with a user-centric mindset
Analyzing stakeholders around the vision of the Digital ecosystem
Be able to prioritize functions and features among websites
